title: The Naughty Bits: The Steamiest and Most Scandalous Sex Scenes from the World's Great Books
description: The literary education you've always lusted for.Fresh from the virtual pages of Nerve.com comes this collection of "naughty bits," an irreverent look into the steamy, scandalous side of literature past and present. With bite-sized salacious excerpts from the classics -- new and old -- each with a fresh, insightful introduction, The Naughty Bits presents the world's great books as you never thought you'd see them.Includes naughty bits DanteD.
